## Path.formatFileLocation() method

Formats a file location to look nice for reporting purposes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static formatFileLocation(options: IPathFormatFileLocationOptions): string;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                                    | Description |
| --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| options   | [IPathFormatFileLocationOptions](./node-core-library.ipathformatfilelocationoptions.md) |             |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

## Remarks

If `pathToFormat` is under the `baseFolder` , then it will be converted to a relative with the `./` prefix. Otherwise, it will be converted to an absolute path.

Backslashes will be converted to slashes, unless the path starts with an OS-specific string like `C:\` .
